post:
We love virtual servers, its what we do. Join us today and experience power, reliability and stability. Choose the platform and location you need and leave the rest up to us.

<b>Network/Infrastructure</b>
We operate from 3 world-class data center's in the US and Europe. Get closer to your target audience to achieve the lowest latency possible and improve website loading and server response times.

UK, Hampshire - Rackcenter1 - 188.227.165.34
US, Kansas City - WholeSaleInternet - 63.141.247.106
DE, Dusseldorf - Equinix - 80.83.123.200

512MB RAM
1024MB Burst
60GB HD Space
600GB Transfer
100MBP/s Uplink (UK Nodes have 1Gbit)
OpenVZ/SolusVM
1 IPv4 Dedicated IP

<b>£4.49/month</b> (Use promotion code 2012)
(Available in UK/US/DE) http://vmport.com/budget-vps.html

(Available in UK/US/DE) http://vmport.com/budget-vps.html

<b>Ordering</b>
You can order and pay with PayPal or MoneyBookers/Skrill, accounts are setup instantly after the first payment (subject to a fraud check). To order the above configs and view the rest of our product range please visit http://vmport.com
